config.description: Verify full gradient over all timesteps

tuning_runs.result: FAILED - ratio 0.206 (error 79.4%), gradient is 5x too small
tuning_runs.notes: Single-timestep adjoints are correct but full gradient has 5x error. Likely due to missing chain rule through optimal intensity q computation.

finding: Single-timestep discrete adjoint is CORRECT (verified against FD). Full gradient has 5x error due to missing chain rule through optimal q(x,y) dependency. Manual adjoint implementation for this problem is too complex.
